articles.title: Red Sox reportedly ‘love’ star slugger Kyle Schwarber as he’s set to hit free agency
articles.description:
Schwarber spent a half-season with the Red Sox in 2021 before becoming one of the game's best power hitters with the Phillies over the last few years.

The post Red Sox reportedly ‘love’ star slugger Kyle Schwarber as he’s set to hit free agency appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Update: Red Sox reportedly ‘love’ star slugger Kyle Schwar

Details:

Schwarber spent a half-season with the Red Sox
